description.translate: Sting, pierce and kill, to you	to whom hope was shattered.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Oncle de sang\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Pique, perce et tue, toi\"}","{\"text\":\"§7à qui on brisa tout espoir.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Sting, pierce and kill, to you\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to whom hope was shattered.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a3 §7LUC§c-2\"}"]}}
